fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Instill false dreams in someone.
- Instill a false dream in the town.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When instilling false dreams in someone, they will believe that they slept peacefully and receive no other notifications.
- When instilling a false dream in the town, you may select a public notification to be broadcasted to the town. The effect will not actually occur.
- You may instill a false dream in the town at night (for the beginning of the day) or at any point in the day. You may only use this once every two phases.
- With the Necronomicon, instilling false dreams in the town will actually cause the effect related to the notification to occur. Any notifications that announce a transformation will cause you to transform into that role, but it will secretly be Coven-aligned.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the Coven.
